transcript: formal education is being disrupted a lot of people are looking or seeking out alternative education sources to make money a lot of people can't afford to spend 4 years and $100,000 and not make money for that period of time to then make the same amount of money that they could just not doing that experience and so like the opportunity cost is massive the demand for income producing skills has not gone away the formal supply of it has and so they are seeking out Alternatives and so that is why that market is growing
